page.title: 05Clubs
page.content: {1st Stubbington Guides-}meet on a Monday and 2nd Stubbington meet on a Friday.Brownies and Guides both meet in the hut next to the Doctor's surgery. The subs are 25p a week. Our uniform is a Blue blouse,a blue skirt,a purse,a belt,a brown leather woggle,a red neckerchief and a hat. 2nd Stubbington a green neckerchief. When we start we make a horse-shoe. We are told what to do during a meeting. We then go into our patrols and talk or go outside to play.The games we play are beans,ball games and racing games.We then have Taps and then go home. {WOODCRAFT-}The pioneers meet at Hammond Hall every Thursday,6.30 to 8.00,it is for girls and boys.We wear green shirts and we get a badge when we say the Creed.We play games and do craft work.In the summer we go to camp
